commit.message:
rs6000.c (rs6000_file_start): Use rs6000_isa_flags not TARGET_DEFAULT.

        * config/rs6000/rs6000.c (rs6000_file_start): Use rs6000_isa_flags
        not TARGET_DEFAULT.
